info.title: Defect Category - Read
info.description: This service is related to the business object Defect. The defect category determines which main reference objects in Quality Management a defect should have.

x-sap-shortText: Read defect categories and their language-dependent texts using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Quality Notification and Defect Processing Integration(SAP_COM_0153)
[Quality Management in Discrete Manufacturing(1E1)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1E1 " Link To BP ")
[Quality Management in Stock Handling(1MR)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1MR " Link To BP ")

get.description: Reads the IDs of all existing defect categories.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.description: Reads the ID of a specific defect category. No further information is provided.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads defect categories with text associations.
get.description: Reads one or more defect categories with associations to the related defect category texts.

parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

get.summary: Reads a set of defect category texts.
get.description: Reads all existing defect category texts. You can filter by ID or language.

get.summary: Reads the text of a defect category in a specific language.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_DefectCategory HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
